text: Hi all, does anyone know how to fetch all Objects for a specific hapikey?
And Is there any API by which we can Test Connecion( test {{hapikey}} is valid or not).

I started using the  php HubSpot/api-client today. And i am curious why the openapi generator is used to create the code? Every object has the same classes like `Filter`, `FliterGroup` and so on. It is easy to add the wrong classes. A developer user experience improvement would be to make a helper methods to point developers to the right API class. For instance `$hubSpot->crm()->contacts()->searchApi()` could become `$HubSpot->CRMContactsSearchApi`, that way IDE's can autocomplete the methods again. Now you have to go through the code or make a variable and typehint the variable to let the IDE's do their work.
The hapikeys have scopes, so you presumably have to try calling an API which is in the covered scope
You'll have to paginate every object type... I don't think there's something like a Backup / DB Image downloader
There is some external software that makes backups, it might save you headache of coding all this stuff
You folks are totally right.  We should be more consistent across our APIs in terms of date-handling and such. Weâ€™ll work on it.  Thanks for your patience.
Just gives me goosebumps when I see developer preview

hey <@U012W4YEUTX> thanks for replying.
I think, I didn't explained my requirements well.
here, I'm looking for an API/way by which i can fetch list of Objects available in HubSpot CRM.
